resources.string: This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution and only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.
Are you sure you want to delete this app?
Support the Developer and FireHound Team
Visit and Join Community for More Information
Donations are welcome and will be used to keep our build servers alive
Official Device Maintainers and Officially Supported Devices
Pour some fuel and spread Fire

FireHound is Custom ROM developed focusing on stability and features! Go go go, flash FireHound and change the way you use your smartphone! For more information, join our community: @ https://plus.google.com/communities/114615598909452601377
Press on color below to apply
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Unable to load image from content provider
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Increase or decrease the time it takes to execute a long press
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar when music plays. Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Medium press and drag to change position. Long press to show edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed

Set what buttons to show when a on-screen keyboard is showing
Enables the navbar to adapt app\'s primary dark color. Restart your desired app to see effect.
Allows swiping on the navigation bar to enable one handed mode

Make sure you have enabled OmniSwitch. You can do this by using \"Settings\" below

This will hide all Immersive Mode Messages
Makes it so one click will turn Battery Saver on or off instead of taking you to settings

Makes it so one click will turn Bluetooth on or off instead of taking you to settings

Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Display negotiated charger max current-voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Emergency Button is visible on lockscreen
Toggle to show Emergency Button on Lockscreen
Double tap to sleep on lockscreen
Double tap anywhere on lockscreen to sleep
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.
This option will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Blur the background when you pull down the status bar
Set the background of notifications translucent
Blur the background of status bar header
Background of recents apps list gets blurred
Blur personalizations are automatically disabled during Keyguard view!

These colors are the ones tinting the BlurBackground. Instead of the normal Grey, you can now choose colors in any way you like.
There are three color filters available for: Light backgrounds, Dark backgrounds and Light/Dark backgrounds.
So how are these colors working?? 
 Simple, as the titles say, the Light filter will be used for Lighter backgrounds, Dark filter for dark backgrounds and the mixed filter one will be used for backgrounds not too dark but neither too light.
These colors are used for both BlurBackgrounds: NotificationsDrawer and RecentsApps
